content: red thread you can also crochet the tongue on the toy insert the hook in the middle of the mouth grab the red yarn draw the loop and make ch1 then follow my description ch12 from the second chain on the hook 3 slip_stitch ch4 from the second chain on the hook 3 slip_stitch designer ekaterina chirkova @chirka_toys work 8 slip_stitch on the main chain cut the yarn leaving the end for sewing pieces attach the tongue to the mouth your snake is ready designer ekaterina chirkova @chirka_toys
